channel.title: Website of Chin Ming Jun
channel.description: Recent content on Website of Chin Ming Jun

item.title: Git Objects Permissions
item.description: Overview In this article, we’ll look at how Git is handling the file mode of each file we’ve checked in.

item.title: Jdbctemplate `queryForStream` Connection Leak
item.description: Connection Leak in queryForStream tldr; The method queryForStream provided by JDBCTemplate produce a Stream with database connection as sources and hence has to be closed explicitly.

item.title: Istio: Sporadic 503 Error
item.description: Random 503 Errors Using Istio service mesh in production, I’ve often come across error logs from the istio-proxy sidecar that reports an observation of 503 errors with the response flags “UC”:
